age_at_stroke.Description: age of the participant at the time of their stroke

sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

Days_POS_MRI.Description: Days since participants stroke that the corresponding MRI was completed

WAB_days_POS_closest match.Description: Days since participants stroke that the WAB (Western Aphasia Battery-Revised) was collected matched most recently to their corresponding MRI scan

MRI_daysPOS_minus_WAB_daysPOS.Description: Days between their MRI to their most closely related WAB (Western Aphasia Battery-Revised)

Aphasia_type_from_wab.Description: Aphasia type from the Western Aphasia Battery
